title: Tim Alberta & Ashley Parker: Fear and the White House response
description: Chief political correspondent for Politico, Tim Alberta, and White House Reporter for the Washington Post, Ashley Parker, join Chuck to talk about the president's handling of the coronavirus. Plus, the NBC News Political Unit gets together to share their picks for best political (and non-political) movies.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
